timeline.bodyText:
Just an idea, shouldn't we upgrade also schema version in the xml? Currently it is 10.0.
Side question - this XML is used as a basic configuration for Infinispan instance that Data Index uses? I wonder why we don't have something similar for kogito runtime service by default, probably because we need more flexibility from the user in Kogito Runtime??
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: @MarianMacik just updated the schema version. As for the configuration XML, correct that is used for these different services, including data index. The reason is there is because indexing must be enabled, otherwise it restricts some of our searching capabilities. As opposed to runtimes, where we use it as a simple key-value store, so default config from Infinispan is fine. We can look into doing something like this for runtimes if there is some specific need.
replies.author: cristianonicolai
